sentences.en: A lane was forthwith opened through the crowd of spectators.
sentences.cn: 围观的人群中挤开了一条通路.

sentences.en: Admiralty forthwith deflected all our warships towards the more southerly route.
sentences.cn: 海军部随即命令所有的舰只驶向更南的航线上去.

sentences.en: But she comes at a good time, and we will look into this matter forthwith. "
sentences.cn: 不过,她来得正好! 我们就来办办这件事吧. ”

sentences.en: Forthwith the fears of the past hour were forgotten.
sentences.cn: 刚才的恐怖立刻被忘却了.

sentences.en: He held that the tapes should be destroyed forthwith.
sentences.cn: 他认为这些录音带必须立即销毁.

sentences.en: He was fined £40, with 28 days’ imprisonment if the money was not produced forthwith.
sentences.cn: 他被罚款40英镑，如不立即缴付则监禁28天。

sentences.en: However, he gave way to her representations , and they entered the furmity booth forthwith.
sentences.cn: 然而他顺从了她的意思, 他们立刻走进卖粥的帐篷里.

sentences.en: I could have you arrested forthwith!
I said good night and left forthwith.
sentences.cn: 我道了晚安后马上走了.

sentences.en: Mr Jones will be dismissed forthwith.
The above are to report to me forthwith.
sentences.cn: 上述人员必须立即向我报告.

sentences.en: The agreement between us is terminated forthwith.
sentences.cn: 我们之间的协议立即终止。

sentences.en: The spur was forthwith transferred to the heap.
sentences.cn: 一眨眼这马刺就进入了那堆破烂里.

sentences.en: These violations of the code must cease forthwith.
sentences.cn: 这些违犯法规的行为必须立即停止.

sentences.en: We motored there forthwith, and examined this wonder of the world from every angle.
sentences.cn: 我们立即乘汽车前去, 从各个角度来观察这个世界奇观.
